duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform automotive repair and maintenance services on various vehicles.
Utilize metal finishing techniques to restore and enhance vehicle exteriors.
Fabricate and customize automotive components to meet specific requirements.
Communicate effectively with team members and clients to ensure smooth operations.
Collaborate with other technicians and bodywork professionals to achieve high-quality results.
Ensure compliance with safety regulations and industry standards in all repair and restoration activities.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (Automotive certification preferred)
